name: Grim Lost The Ledger
description:
You play Grim, a learner Grim Reaper.

On your first day on the job you lose the ledger that tells you who goes to heaven and who goes to hell.

All you have is a quota of HOW MANY people go to heaven and hell.

Get through your first day and hope for the best by directing souls to their fate to fulfil the almighty's quota.

10 LEVELS!

HOW TO PLAY

Click on the platforms to change their direction.

You can only change a certain amount and will have to reuse some arrows.

Start the game by clicking the start platform, in later harder levels the game starts automatically.

When a soul walks onto a direction platform it will walk in the direction the arrow is facing.

You will need to send some souls to heaven and some to hell, this is indicated by the number over each picture.

If a soul falls of the side it becomes lost and the game ends. If too many souls get sent to heaven or hell the game is lost.
